timeline.message:
gCNV VCF cleanup
Only called alleles as alts; QS to QUAL

gCNV VCF cleanup
Only called alleles as alts; QS to QUAL

timeline.bodyText: Would it be better to use GATKTool's createVCFWriter()?
timeline.author: mwalker174

replies.bodyText: The GATKTool method won't accept a sequence dictionary.  It relies on the engine discovering a sequence dictionary from one of the inputs, which doesn't work so well here because the inputs are specified as directories.
replies.author: ldgauthier

replies.bodyText: Isn’t the dictionary hooked up to createVCFWriter now via getBestAvailableSequenceDictionary?
replies.author: samuelklee

replies.bodyText: Ah yes, this is a holdover from before I implemented that suggestion Louis had.  Thanks for the extra set of eyes.
replies.author: ldgauthier

timeline.author: mwalker174
mwalker174

timeline.bodyText: Could write this as final List<Allele> vcAlleles = Lists.newArrayList(REF_ALLELE);
timeline.author: mwalker174

replies.bodyText: Lists is in which package?  avro?
replies.author: ldgauthier
